entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When looking up methods via reflection, be trimming/AOT-friendly #26288
  • SqliteConnection.Open/Close allocate StateChangeEventArgs per every call #26283
  • Using postgre database, paging query performance issues #26282

Closed

  • Sql Server Feature Request: Dynamic Order By clause #26284
  • Preserve DeleteBehavior when scaffolding a database created by EF Core #21252
    6.0.0-rc1
  • Removing a migration can lead to an incorrect snapshot rollback #19637
    5.0.0
  • Using Mysql database Collation function ForMySQLHasCollation() with dotnet ef command not generating correct ModelSnapshot #26280
  • Warning Entity 'Role' has a global query filter defined and is the required end of a relationship with the entity in a Many to Many relationships #26185
  • EFCore 5.0 - UseRelationalNulls value is not being honored #26138

PullRequests

Created

  • Case sensitive parameters 18861 #26287
  • Make Projection_AsEnumerable_projection deterministic #26285
  • [6.0] Fix to #26271 - Temporal history table name always based on entity type name, not table name #26281
    Servicing-consider
